data.title: 8TH - W2 - So Too Neither Either - Activities
data.meta_description: 8TH _ W2 _ SO TOO NEITHER EITHER _ACTIVITIES - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides practice activities from an English textbook for 8th grade students. It includes exercises for students to complete involving using words like "so," "too," "either," and "neither" in sentences expressing agreement or sharing of ideas. It also gives examples of completing sentences with those words. Videos are linked to provide further explanation of using those words. There are also online activities for students to complete as preparation for a quiz focusing on verb tense when using auxiliary verbs.
data.text: 8TH - W2 - So Too Neither Either - Activities
